com.vividsolutions.jcs.conflate.roads.pathmatch
Class RoadPathTracer

java.lang.Object
  com.vividsolutions.jcs.conflate.roads.pathmatch.RoadPathTracer
All Implemented Interfaces:
PathTracer
public class RoadPathTracer
extends java.lang.Object
implements PathTracer

Traces a path through a RoadNetwork starting at a given DirectedEdge and creates @link LinearEdges corresponding to the path edges. The path will only contain edges with a state of UNKNOWN. The path will be traced through junctions as long as there is a "nearly straight" path to follow (within a defined angle tolerance).

Version:
1.0
